#labels guide,robocode
How to use Awbot

= 1.0 Download =
  Download the latest version at [http://code.google.com/p/robocode-asw-awbot/downloads/list here]
  
  Extract the package using [http://winrar.com WinRaR], [http://winzip.com WinZip], etc.


= 2.0 Installation =
  Look for asw.aswbot{{{_}}}{version}.jar, extract it. Copy the folder *asw* to Robocode's folder, under /robot/

  Start Robocode and you will see Awbot from the menu.
